problem: What is in the tips and tricks section of the document what is the document title?
solution:
Based on the document provided:

**Document Title:** tmux Cheat Sheet

**Tips & Tricks Section Contents:**
- Always name your sessions - makes reattaching much easier
- Enable mouse support for beginners
- Learn copy mode for long outputs
- Use zoom (`prefix z`) for focus on one pane
- Synchronize panes for same command on multiple servers
- Keep sessions organized - kill old sessions
